titleStmt.title: The saints legacies: or, A collection of certaine promises out of the word of God Collected for private use, but published for the comfort of Gods people: by Anne Phoenix.
Collection of certaine promises out of the word of God.
titleStmt.author: Fawkner, Antony, b. 1601 or 2, attributed name.
Farindon, Anthony, 1598-1658, attributed name.

editionStmt.edition: The third edition, corrected and amended.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by M. F[lesher]. for R. Roystone in Ivy-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Anne Phoenix is a pseudonym; previous editions signed: A.F., possibly Antony Fawkner or Anthony Farindon--STC.
Originally published in 1629 as: A collection of certaine promises out of the word of God.
Reproduction of original in the British Library, London, England.
